name: StandardLocationService
description: Certain configurations of the Standard Location Service are not optimal.

states.name: Best_16
states.message: Using `kCLLocationAccuracyBest` and a distance filter of 16 is nonoptimal.

states.name: Best_256
states.message: Using `kCLLocationAccuracyBest` and a distance filter of 256 is nonoptimal.

states.name: Best_4096
states.message: Using `kCLLocationAccuracyBest` and a distance filter of 4096 is very nonoptimal.

states.name: Best_65536
states.message: Using `kCLLocationAccuracyBest` and a distance filter of 65536 is very nonoptimal.

states.name: Hundred_4096
states.message: Using `kCLLocationAccuracyHundredMeters` and a distance filter of 4096 is nonoptimal.

states.name: Hundred_65536
states.message: Using `kCLLocationAccuracyHundredMeters` and a distance filter of 65536 is nonoptimal.

states.name: Navigation_16
states.message: Using `kCLLocationAccuracyBestForNavigation` and a distance filter of 16 is nonoptimal.

states.name: Navigation_256
states.message: Using `kCLLocationAccuracyBestForNavigation` and a distance filter of 256 is nonoptimal.

states.name: Navigation_4096
states.message: Using `kCLLocationAccuracyBestForNavigation` and a distance filter of 4096 is very nonoptimal.

states.name: Navigation_65536
states.message: Using `kCLLocationAccuracyBestForNavigation` and a distance filter of 65536 is very nonoptimal.
